rev.diff:
Line 343: Line 343:
After police had removed the tents from the encampment, protestors held a general assembly. It voted 569-31 in favor of a educational General Strike to be held state-wide on Tuesday November 15, 2011.
After police had removed the tents from the encampment, protestors held a general assembly. It voted 569-31 in favor of a educational General Strike to be held state-wide on Tuesday November 15, 2011.
â
Early in the evening of November 10, there was an altercation outside the plaza. Initial reports claimed that one person had been wounded by gunshot. The altercation occurred a distance away from the plaza and it was thought to be unrelated to the Occupation protest.
+
Early in the evening of November 10, there was an altercation outside the plaza. Initial reports claimed that one person had been wounded by gunshot. The altercation occurred a distance away from the plaza and it was thought to be unrelated to the Occupation protest. Oakland has as high rate of violent crimes such as assault, rape and murder occur from two to five times the U.S. average.<ref>[http://www.areaconnect.com/crime/compare.htm?c1=Oakland&s1=CA&c2=San+Jose&s2=CA Crime Rate Comparison: Oakland Vs. San Jose<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.cityrating.com/citycrime.asp?city=Oakland&state=CA Oakland Crime Statistics : California ( CA ) - CityRating.com<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> The 120 murders recorded in 2007 made Oakland's murder rate third highest in California.
In response, members of OccupyOakland gathered together to observe a moment of silence, prayer, and a candlelight vigil for the unknown victim, led by one of the camp chaplains.
In response, members of OccupyOakland gathered together to observe a moment of silence, prayer, and a candlelight vigil for the unknown victim, led by one of the camp chaplains.
